text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DC$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $BA$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $DA$ is $9$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line segment $BD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are also lines $AD$, $BD$, forming a triangle $ABD$.
